title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: San Diego Museum of Man
price: $12.50 adults, $10 seniors/military $8 students, $5 children, free for children under 3
content: Located beneath the majestic California Tower near the Cabrillo Bridge, the Museum of Man is an institution devoted entirely to anthropology. The museum's permanent collection includes exhibits on the Mayan, ancient Egypt, the Kumeyaay Indians of San Diego County, Human Evolution, and the Human Life Cycle, with some incredible displays such as mummies, ancient artifacts from prehistoric cultures, and replicas of ancient monuments.
